meanings.definition: A segment in the tapeworm body containing reproductive organs.
meanings.sent1: The proglottis of the tapeworm is where the reproductive organs are located.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the proglottis of the tapeworm to understand its reproductive system.
meanings.sent3: The proglottis of the tapeworm threw a party for all the other segments.
meanings.sent4: The proglottis of the tapeworm was like a bustling city full of activity.

meanings.sent2: The proglottis of the tapeworm was carefully examined under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The proglottis of the tapeworm was the envy of all the other segments.
meanings.sent4: The proglottis of the tapeworm was a harmonious blend of genders.
meanings.sent5: The proglottis of the tapeworm was like a small community within the parasite.

meanings.definition: A body segment of a tapeworm, containing reproductive organs.

meanings.sent3: The proglottis of the tapeworm was the star of the show.
